title: Soviet Students rock and blue jeans 9_6 MCQ 3

content.prompt: A historian studying the collapse of the Soviet Union in the early 1990s would most likely use the letter above to illustrate which of the following?

choices.label: The alienation of Soviet citizens from their government’s official rhetoric of class struggle and anti-capitalism
The spread of dissident ideas and anti-government resistance movements among Soviet intellectuals
The failure of the Soviet planned economy to deliver even the most basic consumer goods to the USSR’s population
The effects of Gorbachev’s glasnost policies in stimulating an honest exchange of ideas among Soviet citizens

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
